ah, chin phainn2-un7, am3-thau5-a2 chiu7 khi3 tu2 tioh8 chit8 e5 chhiah cha-bou2, kong2 in ang sinn3 Kang i sinn3 Khou2 , chhu3 si7 toa3 ti7 Hou5-lou5-to2, chit8 kang na7 bo5 liah8-leng5 chiu7 kio3 kan-khou2, it-tit8 ka7 goa2 niu2, kio3 goa2 chiu7 toe3 i khi3 pat8 koan2, lan2 phah-sng3 u7 gou7, lak8 pah khou-a2 thang than3, m7 chiah toe3 i kiann5 kah phi5-pe7 chhoan2.
一下跟伊爬到六層樓尾頂，伊煞講欲掠半尾較省，害我氣甲腳手肉都齊冷，我手頭共放一下輕，喝講傷輕；手頭共放一下重，予伊嫌傷重；手頭共放一下闊，伊煞底笑未煞；腳手肉底疲疲掣，阮看按爾就共掠頷管，伊煞對阮笑吻吻，講一句糜底滾（very good），就按爾做伊瞇眯仔睏。

chit8-e7 toe3 i peh kau3 lak8 chan3 lau5-be2-teng2, i soah kong2 beh liah8 poann3 be2 khah seng2, hai7 goa2 khi3 kah kha-chhiu2 bah to chiau5 leng2, goa2 chhiu2-thau5 ka7 pang3 chit8-e7 khin, hoah kong2 siunn khin; chhiu2-thau5 ka7 pang3 chit8-e7 tang7, hou7 i hiam5 siong-tiong7; chhiu2-thau5 ka7 pang3 chit8-e7 khoah, i soah teh chhio3 boe7 soah; kha-chhiu2 bah teh phi5-phi5 chhoah, goan2 khoann3 an2-ni chiu7 ka7 liah8 am7-kun2, i soah tui3 gun2 chhio3-bun2-bun2, kong2 chit8 ku3 be5 teh kun2 (very good) , chiu7 an2-ni cho3 i bi5-bi5-a2 khun3.
一下仔掠好叫伊精神，欲共伊提銅錢，煞起歹面，講阮那底吵伊的眠。我看破柺仔舉了做我行，伊煞追到十字路口，害我笑甲強欲哮。抵著這款赤查某實在無法度！又閣無趁半箍，行行行，緊來望看有好人客否？

chit8-e7-a2 liah8 ho2 kio3 i cheng-sin5, beh ka7 i theh8 tang5-chinn5, soah khi2 phainn2-bin7, kong2 gun2 na2 teh chha2 i e5 bin5. goa2 khoann3-phoa3 koai2-a2 giah8 liau2 choe3 goa2 kiann5, i soah tui kau3 sip8-ji7 lou7-khau2, hai7 goa2 chhio3 kah kiong5 beh hau2. tu2 tioh8 chit khoan2 chhiah cha-bou2 sit8-chai7 bo5 hoat-tou7! iu7 koh bo5 than3 poann3 khou, kiann5 kiann5 kiann5, kin2 lai5 bang7 khoann3 u7 ho2 lang5-kheh bo5?
大馬路，幼街巷一直行規暗，好歹人客無關係，濟少加減趁。啥麼人身軀袂輕鬆，包恁掠了爽快笑瞇瞇，逐家來閣來閣來，緊來緊來。今是走佗去？嘿！佇遐佇遐！掠龍的啊！剛是走佗去？嘿！在遐在遐！掠龍的啊！喂！佗底叫哇？葫蘆島的啦！啊！葫蘆島的啊，葫蘆島的，阮啊NO！NO！NO！

toa7 be2-lou7, iu3-ke-hang7 it-tit8 kiann5 kui am3, ho2-phainn2 lang5-kheh bo5 koan-he7, che7-chio2 ke-kiam2 than3. siann2-mih8 lang5 seng-khu boe7 khin-sang, pau lin2 liah8 liau2 song2-khoai3 chhio3-bi5-bi5, tak8-ke lai5 koh lai5 koh lai5, kin2 lai5 kin2 lai5. tann si7 chau2 to2 khi3? he! ti7 hia ti7 hia! liah8-leng5--e5 ah! kong si7 chau2 to2 khi3? he! chai7 hia chai7 hia! liah8-leng5--e5 ah! oe7! to2 teh kio3-oah? Hou5-lou5-tou2 e5-lah! ah! Hou5-lou5-to2 e5-a2, Hou5-lou5-to2--e5, gun2 ah NO! NO! NO!
來一杯燒心的酒，管待伊解啥人的憂愁，目屎是今夜阮唯一的溫柔，明仔早莫閣為你想，留未椆絕情的手，愛赫爾深又閣怎樣。繁華的世間，不過像夢一場，清醒後隨人去自由。啊！心疼，離開的人你敢會知影，啊！悲歌，踮佇阮心頭唱未煞。

lai5 chit8 poe sio-sim e5 chiu2, koan2-thai7 i kai2 siann2-lang5 e5 iu-chhiu5, bak8-sai2 si7 kim-ia7 goan2 i5-it e5 un-jiu5, bin5-a2-chai3 mai3 koh ui7 li2 siunn7, lau5 be7 tiau5 choat8-cheng5 e5 chhiu2, ai3 hiah-nih chhim iu7 koh chainn2-iunn7. hoan5-hoa5 e5 se3-kan, put-ko3 chhiunn7 bang7 chit8 tiunn5, chheng-chhenn2 au7 sui5 lang5 khi3 chu7-iu5. ah! sim-thiann3, li7-khui e5 lang5 li2 kam2 e7 chai-iann2, ah! pi-koa, tiam3 ti7 gun2 sim-thau5 chhiunn3 be7 soah.
阮將全部的愛做一次博，若拄著你阮免想欲贏，偆這粒無人愛的心肝。等未到海枯石爛，阮將愛情看做唯一性命，若拄著你阮免想欲活，從今後無你的我，甘願永遠孤單。

goan2 chiong choan5-pou7 e5 ai3 choe3 chit8 chhu3 poah8, na7 tu2 tioh8 li2 goan2 bian2 siunn7 beh iann5, chhun chit liap8 bo5 lang5 ai3 e5 sim-koann. tan2 boe7 kau3 hai2-khou-chioh8-noa7, goan2 chiong ai3-cheng5 khoann3-choe3 i5-it sinn3-mia7, na7 tu2 tioh8 li2 goan2 bian2 siunn7 beh oah8, chiong5 kim-au7 bo5 li2 e5 goa2, kam-goan7 eng2-oan2 kou-toann.
